<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ant](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=125)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 20 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Ants are industrious insects that aid the natural processes of decay and renewal.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Army Ant Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=549) (Creature 5), [Giant Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=548) (Creature 2)
name: Ant
